entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:48 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
